movies.name: Red Widow
movies.plot: A widow learns that her husband was a mobster, and soon finds herself in the world of organized crime as she takes her revenge on those who murdered him.

movies.name: Rent
movies.plot: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

movies.name: Rollerball
movies.plot: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.
movies.language: English, Russian, French, Arabic, Korean, German, Japanese

movies.name: Romeo Must Die
movies.plot: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

movies.name: San Andreas
movies.plot: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

movies.name: San Francisco
movies.plot: A Barbary Coast saloonkeeper and a Nob Hill impresario are rivals for the affections of a beautiful singer, both personally and professionally in 1906 San Francisco.

movies.name: Sausalito
movies.plot: Ella is a divorced Chinese American taxi driver who spends her days ferrying people around the roads of Sausalito, San Francisco. After work, she spends time with her 8-year old son, Scott....

movies.name: Sense8
movies.plot: A group of people around the world are suddenly linked mentally, and must find a way to survive being hunted by those who see them as a threat to the world's order.

movies.name: Serendipity
movies.plot: A couple reunite years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.

movies.name: Serial
movies.plot: It's the end of the 70s. Hippies are assimilating, women are raising their consciousness, and men are becoming confused and ineffectual. Don't expect to be able to keep track of all the ...

movies.name: Seven Girlfriends
movies.plot: Jesse is charming, romantic, and he knows how to pop the question; he just can't face marriage. So, when he and Hannah split up during the same week that a former fiancée dies, he decides ...

movies.name: Shadow of the Thin Man
movies.plot: Nick and Nora are at their wise-cracking best as they investigate murder and racketeering at a local race-track.

movies.name: Shattered
movies.plot: A perfect family's dynamic is ruined by a kidnapper's brutally efficient plot.

movies.name: Shoot the Moon
movies.plot: A fifteen year marriage dissolves, leaving both the husband and wife, and their four children, devastated. He's preoccupied with a career and a mistress, she with a career and caring for ...

movies.name: Sister Act
movies.plot: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

movies.name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
movies.plot: The sisters come back to Delores's show to get her back as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of students in their parochial school which is doomed for closure. One of the girls...

movies.name: Smile Again, Jenny Lee
movies.plot: A young woman's relentless search for her absentee father uncovers long-held family secrets.

movies.name: Sneakers
movies.plot: A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.

movies.name: So I Married an Axe Murderer
movies.plot: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment has a girlfriend who he suspects may not be who she appears.

movies.name: Sphere
movies.plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

movies.name: Star Trek II : The Wrath of Khan
movies.plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

movies.name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
movies.plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to 20th century Earth to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it, humpback whales.

movies.name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
movies.plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

movies.name: Steve Jobs
movies.plot: Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

movies.name: Stigmata
movies.plot: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.
movies.language: English, Assyrian Neo-Aramaic, Portuguese, Italian, Aramaic

movies.name: Street Music
movies.plot: N/A

movies.name: Sudden Fear
movies.plot: After an ambitious actor insinuates himself into the life of a wealthy middle-aged playwright and marries her, he plots with his mistress to murder her.

movies.name: Sudden Impact
movies.plot: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.

movies.name: Summertime
movies.plot: A lonely American woman unexpectedly finds romance in Venice, Italy.

movies.name: Superman
movies.plot: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

movies.name: Susan Slade
movies.plot: Premarital sex, secrets, and society. At 17, shy Susan Slade is on her way to California after a ten-year stay at a remote Chilean mine where her father was chief engineer. Onboard ship, ...

movies.name: Sweet November
movies.plot: The story centers around a man and a woman, whose fates are intertwined and will change forever. Nelson is an avid advertiser living in San Francisco. One day, during a driving test, he ...

movies.name: Swing
movies.plot: Max is on holiday at his grandmother's place in the Elzas in France. He's fascinated by the guitar playing of gypsy Miraldo. In exchange for writing letters to the social security ...

movies.name: Take the Money and Run
movies.plot: The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.

movies.name: Terminator - Genisys
movies.plot: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

movies.name: The Assassination of Richard Nixon
movies.plot: Based on real life events, Assassination is set in 1974 and centers on a businessman who decides to take extreme measures to achieve his American dream.

movies.name: The Bachelor
movies.plot: A committment-phobic man goes in search of a bride including his fed up girlfriend, to inherit his grandfather's $100 million inheritance.

movies.name: The Birds
movies.plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

movies.name: The Bridge
movies.plot: When a body is found on the bridge between Denmark and Sweden, right on the border, Danish inspector Martin Rohde and Swedish Saga Norén have to share jurisdiction and work together to find the killer.

movies.name: The Caine Mutiny
movies.plot: When a US Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

movies.name: The Californians
movies.plot: Slick, smug developer Gavin Ransom has a dream: make millions by blanketing the coastal hills of northern California with flamboyant, mini mansions. His sister Olive a raving ...

movies.name: The Candidate
movies.plot: Bill McKay is a candidate for the U.S. Senate from California. He has no hope of winning, so he is willing to tweak the establishment.

movies.name: The Competition
movies.plot: The movie centers on a piano competition whose winner is assured of success. It is Paul's last chance to compete, but newcomer Heidi may be a better pianist. Can romance be far away? Will ...

movies.name: The Conversation
movies.plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that a couple he is spying on will be murdered.

movies.name: The Core
movies.plot: The only way to save Earth from catastrophe is to drill down to the core and set it spinning again.

movies.name: The Dead Pool
movies.plot: Dirty Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

movies.name: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
movies.plot: A teen artist living in 1970s San Francisco enters into an affair with her mother's boyfriend.

movies.name: The Doctor
movies.plot: Jack McKee is a doctor with it all: he's successful, he's rich, and he has no problems.... until he is diagnosed with throat cancer. Now that he has seen medicine, hospitals, and doctors ...

movies.name: The Doors
movies.plot: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

movies.name: The Enforcer
movies.plot: Dirty Harry must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with a rookie female partner that he's not too excited to be working with.

movies.name: The Fan
movies.plot: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

movies.name: The Fog of War
movies.plot: John Millhouse has just returned home after four years of service in The United States Army. He wants nothing more than to return to a 'normal' life, but the horrors of war and his never ...

movies.name: The Game
movies.plot: Wealthy San Francisco financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.

movies.name: The Graduate
movies.plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

movies.name: The House on Telegraph Hill
movies.plot: Concentration camp survivor Victoria Kowelska finds herself involved in mystery, greed, and murder when she assumes the identity of a dead friend in order to gain passage to America.

movies.name: The Internship
movies.plot: Two salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital age find their way into a coveted internship at Google, where they must compete with a group of young, tech-savvy geniuses for a shot at employment.

movies.name: The Jazz Singer
movies.plot: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

movies.name: The Lady from Shanghai
movies.plot: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

movies.name: The Last of the Gladiators
movies.plot: World renowned daredevil, Evel Knievel, tells the story of his exploits and philosphy, intercut with his stunts and the comments of various observers and friends.

movies.name: The Laughing Policeman
movies.plot: In San Francisco, one victim in a mass murder is a police detective. His partner and a new partner investigate in the city's seamy side.

movies.name: The Lineup
movies.plot: In San Francisco, a psychopathic gangster and his mentor retrieve heroin packages carried by unsuspecting travelers.

movies.name: The Love Bug
movies.plot: A race car driver becomes a champion with a Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own.

movies.name: The Maltese Falcon
movies.plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

movies.name: The Master
movies.plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.name: The Net
movies.plot: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

movies.name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.

movies.name: The Organization
movies.plot: After a group of young revolutionaries break into a corporation's headquarters and steal $5,000,000 worth of heroin to keep it off the street, they call on San Francisco Police Lieutenant ...

movies.name: The Other Sister
movies.plot: A mentally challenged girl proves herself to be every bit as capable as her "perfect" sister when she moves into an apartment and begins going to college.

movies.name: The Parent Trap
movies.plot: Identical twins, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

movies.name: The Presidio
movies.plot: Jay Austin is now a civilian police detective. Colonel Caldwell was his commanding officer years before when he left the military police over a disagreement over the handling of a drunk ...

movies.name: The Princess Diaries
movies.plot: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her 16th year.

movies.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.plot: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.

movies.name: The Right Stuff
movies.plot: The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

movies.name: The Rock
movies.plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

movies.name: The Sweetest Thing
movies.plot: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.

movies.name: The Ten Commandments
movies.plot: The Egyptian Prince, Moses, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

movies.name: The Times of Harvey Milk
movies.plot: A documentary of the successful career and assassination of San Francisco's first elected gay councilor.

movies.name: The Towering Inferno
movies.plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

movies.name: The Wedding Planner
movies.plot: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

movies.name: The Woman In Red
movies.plot: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte - an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her - but what would his wife say?

movies.name: The Zodiac
movies.plot: An elusive serial killer known as the Zodiac terrorizes the San Francisco Bay in the late 1960s, while detectives aim to stop him before he claims more victims. Based on a true story.

movies.name: They Call Me MISTER Tibbs
movies.plot: San Francisco Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs is called in to investigate when a liberal street preacher and political candidate is accused of murdering a prostitute. Tibbs is also battling ...

movies.name: Thief of Hearts
movies.plot: A woman trapped in a boring marriage begins an affair with a handsome man who seems able to read her mind. She doesn't know that he has broken into her house and read her diaries, where she...

movies.name: Time After Time
movies.plot: H.G. Wells pursues Jack the Ripper to the 20th Century when the serial murderer uses the future writer's time machine to escape his time period.

movies.name: Tin Cup
movies.plot: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

movies.name: To the Ends of the Earth
movies.plot: In 1812, young British aristocrat Edmund Talbot travels by ship to Australia, and learns more about himself and about life than he had ever bargained for.

movies.name: True Believer
movies.plot: A cynical former civil liberties attorney now reduced to "specializing" in defending drug dealers becomes transformed by an eight-year-old murder case.

movies.name: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
movies.plot: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

movies.name: Tweek City
movies.plot: Tweek City is a week in the life of Bill, a potentially closeted, half-Latino, small-time speed dealer in San Francisco's Mission District. Bill is stuck on an endless walk from one empty ...

movies.name: Twisted
movies.plot: Jessica, whose father killed her mother and committed suicide, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the center of her own investigation, when her former lovers start being murdered.

movies.name: Under the Tuscan Sun
movies.plot: A writer impulsively buys a villa in Tuscany in order to change her life.
movies.language: English, Italian, Polish, French, Spanish, German

movies.name: Until the End of the World
movies.plot: Set in 1999, a woman (Dommartin) has a car accident with some bank robbers, who enlist her help to take the bank money to a drop in Paris. On the way she runs into another fugitive from the...

movies.name: Vegas in Space
movies.plot: Three soldiers are ordered to change their gender (via a pill) and are sent on a secret mission (undercover as show girls) to the women only planet of Clitoris' capital city "Vegas in Space...

movies.name: Vertigo
movies.plot: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

movies.name: What Dreams May Come
movies.plot: After he dies in a car crash, a man searches heaven and hell for his beloved wife.

movies.name: What the Bleep Do We Know
What's Up Doc?
movies.plot: Bugs' showbiz career is recounted from babyhood to stardom. Bugs and Elmer Fudd perform the title song.

movies.name: When a Man Loves a Woman
movies.plot: An airline pilot and his wife are forced to face the consequences of her alcoholism when her addictions threaten her life and their daughter's safety. While the woman enters detox, her husband must face the truth of his enabling behavior.

movies.name: Woman on the Run
movies.plot: Frank Johnson flees police after becoming an eyewitness to murder. He is pursued around scenic San Francisco by his wife, a reporter, the police, and... the real murderer.

movies.name: Woman on Top
movies.plot: Brazilian chef Isabella Oliveira moves to San Francisco when her husband, frustrated by her motion sickness, cheats on her.

movies.name: Yours, Mine and Ours
movies.plot: When a widower with 10 children marries a widow with 8, can the 20 of them ever come together as one big happy family? From finding a house big enough for all of them and learning to make ...

movies.name: Zodiac
movies.plot: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
